original_body_lines: 'Sri Lanka Skills Expo 2023' The 'Sri Lanka Skills Expo 2023' exhibition, which fulfills the dreams of job seekers, held on the May 12, 13 and 14 at the Sirimavo Bandaranaike Memorial Exhibition Centre in the BMICH premises in Colombo. The inauguration ceremony was held under the patronage of President Ranil Wickremesinghe and Education Minister Susil Premajayantha. Pix by Kithsiri de Mel
